title: Home Networking Engineer
summary: Apple is looking for a talented and energetic software engineer for the Core Networking team to participate in the architecture and development of the next generation of networking technology.
description: The candidate will work in a fast paced environment, operate gracefully under stress, handle multiple assignments in parallel, and be self driven to be effective in an environment with little overhead.
key_qualifications:
Experience developing commercial networking software and/or hardware products
Strong software design and development skills including C, C++ or Objective-C programming language experience
Detailed knowledge of the TCP/IP suite of protocols (including IPv6)
BSD/Linux Kernel network stack
Network troubleshooting skills
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
WiFi router concepts, OpenWRT experience a plus
Understanding of IP routing concepts and protocols
education_experience: MS or equivalent experience in Computer Science
additional_requirements:
Mac OS and iOS development experience
API development experience
Wireless networking technologies and standards (Wi-Fi and cellular)
Network debugging tools (e.g. packet sniffers, protocol analyzers)
Thread Mesh Network technology
